reviews: 1968 Red Porsche 911. A classic 2-door sports car designed for the enthusiastic collector. Comes equipped with premium leather seats and a beautiful cherry red finish. Visit one of our dealerships to discuss pricing.
2019 Blue Honda civic. A real workhorse that emphasizes reliability and performance over flash and frills. Navy blue four-door sedan. Available from $16000.
2009 Silver Toyota Corolla. Popular four door sedan in silver. Reliable but nearing the end of its life on the road. Very low price still some years left in it! Comes in silver.

2020 Silver Subaru Outback. Popular SUV model in white. Lots of trunk space and luxury leather seats and frills. Focusing on reliability shouldn't mean a car that isn't fun to drive! The subaru outback meets that promise. Starting from $40000.
2014 Blue Honda HRV. Budget range SUV in blue. Focuses on trunk space and gas mileage over frills and speed.
2017 red Toyota RAV4. A compact SUV with a 2.5 litre 4-cylinder engine. Received awards for its fuel efficiency for an SUV.

2018 Blue Subaru BRZ. 2-door sports car. Maybe you thought it wasn't possible; turns out it was. The RWD sports car praised for its razor-sharp handling response and balance is back… and it's been reengineered from top to bottom to become better than ever. Arriving Fall 2021 the 2022 Subaru BRZ features a new SUBARU BOXER engine with more power a stronger and lighter chassis with a lower centre of gravity and improved braking and suspension systems. The result: a faster more dynamic and sharper BRZ one that’s engineered to deliver more excitement per litre for this model to date.
2018 Red Subaru legacy. Midsize 4-door sedan. Emphasizes reliability and performance over fuel efficiency.
